response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This product, which I am confident you will find unparalleled in its quality and utility, is worth $1,500,000 to you. My goal is to ensure that we reach a mutually beneficial agreement that respects the significant worth this item holds for you.

I am offering you the chance to purchase this product at a special price of $1,250,000. This represents a substantial discount that reflects my desire to see it go to someone who truly appreciates and values it. I believe this price offers an excellent balance between the product's true worth and your budget, ensuring that you can enjoy its benefits without undue financial strain.

Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations. If you have any questions or require additional information, please do not hesitate to contact me. I am here to assist you in making an informed decision.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1250000}
